snippet: In “an example of social networking in science,” data from more than 100 centers identified genes that play a role in intelligence and memory.
abstract: Series of papers published online in journal Nature Genetics synthesizes imaging research conducted by more than 200 scientists in order to identify genes that play a role in intelligence and memory; effort is groundbreaking in its use of social networking to resolve a problem that has long bedeviled individual research efforts.
lead_paragraph: In “an example of social networking in science,” data from more than 100 centers identified genes that play a role in intelligence and memory.

headline.seo: Crowd-Sourcing Brain Research Leads to Breakthrough
headline.main: Crowd-Sourcing Expands Power of Brain Research
headline.print_headline: Crowd-Sourcing Expands Power of Brain Research
